name: Wacky Duels
description:
Wacky duel is the first game we are making in our game a month for a year challenge!

Can you be the best duelist around? Here in the land of Wacky Duels, it is always High Noonish!

Battle against your friends in same screen multiplayer to see who is the best in the West or East! Maybe you prefer North or South? Anyways it doesn't matter! Wherever you are from you can duel with your friends or try to fight your way through singleplayer mode to test your skills!
